course_description: Master Python from scratch: write real programs, automate tasks, and build a portfolio of projects in the world’s most in-demand language.
course_overview: This immersive beginner course takes you from zero to confident Python programmer. You will learn core syntax, control flow, data structures, functions, file I/O, error handling, and the essentials of object-oriented programming. Each module pairs concise theory with hands-on labs—build a calculator, a text analyzer, and a web scraper—while weekly quizzes and a capstone project reinforce retention. By the end, you will read and write Pythonic code, debug efficiently, and be ready for specialized fields like data science, web development, or automation.
target_audience: Absolute beginners aged 15+, career changers, analysts, and hobbyists with no prior coding experience.
learning_outcomes: Install and configure a Python development environment
Apply variables, operators, and control structures to solve problems
Create and manipulate lists, dictionaries, tuples, and sets
Design reusable functions with proper documentation
Read from and write to files using exception handling
Implement classes and objects following OOP principles
Debug syntax and logical errors using IDE tools
Develop a terminal-based portfolio project meeting user requirements
